.
<Block>
  # Test 1
  <markdown>

    # Markdown can be embedded within <markdown> tags

        Here is some code

  </markdown>
</Block>
.
createElement(Block, {},
  "# Test 1",
  markdown({},
    h1({}, "Markdown can be embedded within <markdown> tags"),
    codeBlock({},
      "Here is some code"
    )
  )
)
.



.
<Block>
  <markdown>
    <Block>
      # JSX blocks can be embedded within embedded markdown
    </Block>
  </markdown>
</Block>
.
createElement(Block, {},
  markdown({},
    createElement(Block, {},
      "# JSX blocks can be embedded within embedded markdown",
    )
  )
)
.



.
<Block>
  <markdown>
    # `<markdown>` tags must end at the same indentation level that they started at
    </markdown>
</Block>
.
createElement(Block, {},
  markdown({},
    "# `<markdown>` tags must end at the same indentation level that they started at",
  )
)
.


.
<Block>
  <markdown>
    # `<markdown>` tag content must
  not reduce in indentation
  </markdown>
</Block>
.
createElement(Block, {},
  markdown({},
    "# `<markdown>` tag content must\n  not reduce in indentation",
  )
)
.
